posts.post_content: What about combining him with [Malfegor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Malfegor)? Especially in a multiplayer game. When you cast the demon dragon, you dump a load of instants into your graveyard, then Toshiro casts them for you! In fact, a couple of copies of [Breath of Malfegor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Breath of Malfegor) could be a characterful win condition :-)

posts.post_content: Toshiro Umezawa is one of the acolytes of the [Myojin of Night's Reach](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myojin of Night's Reach). He became instrumental in the kami war. After the war, he was brought to Dominaria by his patron thus the Umezawa lineage was born and the famous [Tetsuo Umezawa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tetsuo Umezawa) being among his descendants.
